Parotidectomy.context: Parotidectomy procedure (Medical Transcription Sample Report) The patient was prepped and draped.

preauricular incision.context: A preauricular incision was made with the incision extending behind the earlobe and down slightly into the neck.

bleeding.context: Bleeding was minimal and was treated with bipolar cautery and 4-0 chromic ties.

bipolar cautery.context: Bleeding was minimal and was treated with bipolar cautery and 4-0 chromic ties.

4-0 chromic ties.context: Bleeding was minimal and was treated with bipolar cautery and 4-0 chromic ties.

great auricular nerve.context: The great auricular nerve and external jugular vein were transsected and tied with 3-0 Vicryl sutures.

external jugular vein.context: The great auricular nerve and external jugular vein were transsected and tied with 3-0 Vicryl sutures.

3-0 Vicryl sutures.context: The great auricular nerve and external jugular vein were transsected and tied with 3-0 Vicryl sutures.

suction drain.context: A suction drain was inserted into the depth of the wound and brought out through the skin posteriorly.

satisfactory condition.context: The patient tolerated the procedure well and left the OR in satisfactory condition.

followup exam.context: The patient is to be seen back in the office in two days for followup exam, suture check, and possibly drain removal.
